reviews.Title: Excellent
reviews.Comment: Battery backup amazing,lasts about 2 and half days with normal usage. Media consumption highly satisfied. Good sound, voice calling very good and clear at both ends. Super brightness. Very good connectivity with regards to wifi and mobile data of Airtel and Jio. About the AI features and Siri I'm not an expert to talk about. Didn't experience anything bad about the iphone 16 plus until now.

CONS

reviews.Title: Highly recommended
reviews.Comment: Upgrading from the iPhone 12 Pro Max is an exceptional experience. However, the inclusion of a Type-C port with a version of 2.0 is somewhat disappointing. It would have been preferable to see a USB 3.0 port, which would have provided faster data transfer speeds.

reviews.Title: Excellent
reviews.Comment:
I got this beautiful phone yesterday. It was my plan to buy an iPhone 16 Plus since the time it was launched in September 2024. It is amazing!! Thank you, Flipkart, for delivering it on time.

I must say your delivery associate was very polite, and he stayed with me till the time the new phone was configured and erased my old iPhone 11 data completely. Thanks once again.

reviews.Title: Could be way better
reviews.Comment: I purchased an iPhone 16 Plus from Flipkart, but it has several hardware issues that the Apple Store has confirmed. Sadly, Flipkart has not provided any help with getting a replacement. I'm quite disappointed and would recommend that others consider this carefully before spending such a significant amount.

reviews.Title: Wonderful
reviews.Comment: I live outside of India and ordered this phone online for my mom. I was honestly scared at first because I had never ordered anything this expensive online before. With all the videos online showing people getting a soap bar instead of a phone it made me worry a lot. But the whole process was smooth and we received the phone safely. I also checked the IMEI number from the phone settings on the Apple website to confirm it is a genuine device. Very happy with my purchase

reviews.Title: Just wow!

reviews.Title: Expected a better product : Issues with Airtel
reviews.Comment:
Look like there is a conflict between Iphone and Airtel. eSim, Physical sim's all are getting blocked.
If you are Airtel user , dont buy this or switch to another nettwork.
